job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen the clients

   leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our

   relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative

   NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use

   cases across all the countries our client operates in.

   The opportunity

   As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts

   (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge

   conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you

   understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform

   on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production, You Will Be Responsible For
     * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM

   technologies.
     * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
     * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at clients

   Analytics.
     * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
     * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
     * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
     * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI
job_details.full_text:
CLOUD ENGINEER (TERRAFORM, AZURE DEVOPS)

Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen the clients

   leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our

   relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative

   NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use

   cases across all the countries our client operates in.

   The opportunity

   As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts

   (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge

   conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you

   understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform

   on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production, You Will Be Responsible For
     * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM

   technologies.
     * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
     * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at clients

   Analytics.
     * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
     * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
     * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
     * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs), including their implementation, productionalization, and integration into conversational AI products. While cloud infrastructure and data pipelines are mentioned, the core focus is on leveraging GenAI technologies to build user-facing applications and enhance customer interactions.

phrases: ensure the improvement of our products
supporting all countries in reaching their targets
strengthen the clients leadership in digitalization
support our 40 million customers
understand business needs
increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand business goals, customer needs, and how technology can drive business outcomes and efficiencies.

phrases: Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow
BigQuery datasets/views
job_tasks.justification: The mention of creating data pipelines and working with BigQuery datasets/views directly relates to the process of building and maintaining data infrastructure.

conversational AI products
compliant generative AI chatbot
operationalize the conversational platform
Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies
Implementing GCP native ML architectures
working with Vertex AI

phrases: partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure
architect GCP cloud solutions
inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform
You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs
productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production
Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the design, implementation, and operationalization of cloud-native applications and solutions, including working with APIs and making technical decisions for systems.

Implementing GCP native ML architectures
job_tasks.justification: The repeated emphasis on 'production', 'operationalization', and 'productionalization' points to the deployment and maintenance of AI solutions in a live environment.

Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team
